name: AutoGG
description: A less aggressive approach to level completion comment automation.

preFill.name: Pre-filled Level Comment Message
preFill.description:
The message pre-fill text for a level comment. Note that the attempt count will immediately follow whatever text you put here.

Using default settings, the pre-filled message will be:
<cl>`GG!`</c> `(1237582 att)`.

Optionally, Platformer levels will include the number of seconds you took to complete the level as well:

<cl>`GG!`</c> `(1237582 att 7442 sec)`
## <c_>***__This WILL be trimmed to 30 characters!!!__***</c>

includeSecondsForPlatformer.name: Platformer Levels: Include Attempt Time
includeSecondsForPlatformer.description:
Include the total time you spent completing the Platformer level.

Using default settings, the pre-filled message would be:

`GG! (1237582 att, 7442.34 sec)`

levelLengthMinimum.name: Track Classic Levels (Specify Minimum Length)
levelLengthMinimum.description:
The minimum level length needed to pre-fill the comment box.

<cy>For Platformer levels, see other settings.</c>

enableOnPlatformer.name: Track Platformer Levels
enableOnPlatformer.description:
Pre-fills the comment box when completing Platformer levels.

<cy>For Classic levels, see other settings.</c>

trackDemons.name: Track Demon Levels
trackDemons.description:
Pre-fill the comment box when completing a Demon level.

<cy>This setting does NOT apply to Non-Demon levels; see other settings instead.</c>

onlyTrackRated.name: Non-Demon Levels: Track Rated Levels Only
onlyTrackRated.description:
Pre-fill the comment box when completing a rated level ONLY.

<cy>This setting does NOT apply to Demon levels; see other settings instead.</c>

minimumStars.name: Tracking Rated Levels: Star/Moon Rate Minimum
minimumStars.description:
Minimum star/moon rate required to pre-fill the comment box when completing a rated level.

<cy>This setting does NOT apply to Demon levels; see other settings instead.</c>

alsoFillForProfileComments.name: Also Pre-Fill for Profile Comments
alsoFillForProfileComments.description: Pre-fill the comment box when making a profile comment/post as well.

profilePreFill.name: Pre-filled Profile Comment Message
profilePreFill.description:
The message pre-fill text. Note that the attempt count will immediately follow whatever text you put here.

Using default settings, the pre-filled message will be:
`Stereo Madness 100%`<cl>`GG!`</c> `(1237582 att)`.

Optionally, Platformer levels will include the number of seconds you took to complete the level as well:

`The Tower 100%`<cl>`GG!`</c> `(1237582 att 7442 sec)`
## <c_>***__This WILL be trimmed to 30 characters!!!__***</c>

issues.info: Ping me <cl>(@erymanthus)</c> in the Geode SDK Discord server's <cl>#help</c> channel if you need help. <cr>DMs are NOT accepted.</c>
